title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 22 July 2016 - XWiki

10:15 <vmassol> sorry about that  
10:15 <vmassol> I'm crating a new subwiki for snippets

10:46 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
10:48 <Evi\_> has joined #xwiki  
10:50 <Evi\_> Hi Guys! Can someone help me? How can I change the CSS of a Makro, e.g. Recent Blog Entries? I would like to minimize the font size of the text, I think it's quite big  
10:52 <vmassol> Evi\_: hi, I guess you could use a CSS stylsheet; see http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/SkinExtensionsTutorial  
10:55 <Evi\_> ok, thx for the hint, cnassol, I'll try it out  
10:58 <ClemensR> XWiki.JasaSEO looks much like a spam profile, I guess I will go and delete that acocunt  
11:01 <vmassol> ok ClemensR  
12:12 <tmortagne> has quit  
12:14 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
12:23 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
12:27 <tmortagne> has quit  
12:36 <moep> has joined #xwiki  
13:17 <sdumitriu> has quit  
14:09 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
14:38 <vmassol> mflorea: is there an api to rename and do the rediect? Can't find it on http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Refactoring+Module  
14:40 <vmassol> just found RefactoringScriptService  
14:40 <vmassol> apparently not  
14:40 <mflorea> vmassol: I don't fully understand what you mean  
14:40 <mflorea> "rename and do the rediect"  
14:40 <vmassol> ah yes there is but I need groovy  
14:41 <vmassol> so it's the default  
14:41 <vmassol> I'll fix the doc then  
14:41 <mflorea> you don't need groovy for the refactoring API  
14:41 <vmassol> what if you don't want the redirect?  
14:41 <vmassol> you need to pass a MoveRequest  
14:41 <vmassol> you can create it in velocity?  
14:41 <mflorea> you configure the rename request  
14:41 <mflorea> sure  
14:41 <vmassol> cool  
14:42 <vmassol> doc is a bit lacking ;)  
14:42 <mflorea> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-web/src/main/webapp/templates/rename.vm#L56  
14:58 <vmassol> going to turn off ircbot while doing the copy  
15:03 <moep> has quit  
15:06 <vmassol> just removed 223 extensions from exo, sorry ;)  
15:06 <vmassol> (moved the snippets to snippets.xwiki.org)  
15:07 <vmassol> bad for our extension stats ;)  
15:07 <vmassol> 646 extensions now instead of 800+
